mapper.select: select * from (SELECT am.cardid, typename, cardicon, minprice, maxprice, xgocoin, starttime, endtime, commentstartdays, watchdays, commentcount, yield, forder, DATE_FORMAT(am.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createtime, am.createid, DATE_FORMAT(am.updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as updatetime, am.updateid, case when STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= now() AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),endtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') > now() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as isbuy, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) as secondbuy, ar.status as havebuy FROM c_t_app_membercard am left join c_t_app_rushtobuy ar on am.cardid = ar.cardid and ar.userid = #{userid} and ar.createtime > CURDATE() and ar.status != 3 ) A order by isbuy desc, havebuy, forder

select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),date_add(ao.rushtime, interval 1 hour)) as remaintime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield, mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.rushtime > date_add(now(), interval -1 hour) and ao.status = 1 and ao.buyuserid = #{userid} union select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),date_add(buytime, interval 1 hour)) as remaintime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.buytime > date_add(now(), interval -1 hour) and ao.status = 2 and ao.buyuserid = #{userid} union select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, 0, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.status = 4 and ao.buyuserid = #{userid}

SELECT mc.cardid, mc.typename, mc.cardicon, mc.minprice, mc.maxprice, mc.xgocoin, mc.starttime, mc.endtime, mc.commentstartdays, mc.watchdays, mc.commentcount, mc.yield, DATE_FORMAT(bu.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createtime, timestampdiff(SECOND,bu.createtime,now()) as secondbuy, bu.status, mc.forder FROM c_t_app_rushtobuy bu left join c_t_app_membercard mc on bu.cardid = mc.cardid where bu.userid = #{userid} and bu.status = 1 order by bu.status,bu.createtime desc

select ao.orderid, mc.cardimg, mc.introduction, mc.description, ao.ordernum, DATE_FORMAT(ao.rushtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buytime, ao.cardprice,IFNULL(us.xgocoin,0) xgocoin, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount,mc.typename, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(ao.createtime,INTERVAL mc.watchdays DAY),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') duetime, pay.weixinnum,pay.weixinqrcode,pay.weixinrealname,pay.alipaynum,pay.alipayqrcode,pay.alipayrealname,pay.bank,pay.banknum,pay.bankrealname,sus.phone from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid left join c_t_app_userinfo us on ao.buyuserid = us.userid left join c_t_app_paymentmethod pay on ao.selluserid = pay.userid left join c_t_app_userinfo sus on ao.selluserid = sus.userid where ao.orderid=#{orderid} and ao.status = 1

SELECT ce.realname, us.phone, pm.weixinnum FROM c_t_app_userinfo us LEFT JOIN c_t_app_certification ce ON ce.userid = us.userid AND ce. STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN c_t_app_paymentmethod pm ON ce.userid = pm.userid WHERE us.userid = #{userid} LIMIT 1

select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),date_add(ao.rushtime, interval 1 hour)) as remaintime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.selltime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as selltime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.rushtime > date_add(now(), interval -1 hour) and ao.status = 1 and ao.selluserid = #{userid} union select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),date_add(ao.buytime, interval 1 hour)) as remaintime, DATE_FORMAT(buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.selltime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as selltime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.buytime > date_add(now(), interval -1 hour) and ao.status = 2 and ao.selluserid = #{userid} union select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, 0, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.selltime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as selltime, mc.typename, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.status = 0 and ao.selluserid = #{userid}

select ao.orderid, ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,mc.cardimg,ao.ordernum, DATE_FORMAT(ao.selltime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as selltime, ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),date_add(ao.buytime, interval 1 hour)) as remaintime, ao.payorder,ce.realname,us.phone, pm.weixinnum,mc.typename, mc.forder from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid left join c_t_app_certification ce on ao.buyuserid = ce.userid and ce.status = 1 left join c_t_app_userinfo us on ce.userid = us.userid left join c_t_app_paymentmethod pm on ce.userid = pm.userid where ao.orderid= #{orderid} and ao.selluserid = #{userid}

mapper.select: select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, mc.typename, timestampdiff(day,now(),ao.duetime) as remainwatchdays, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where ao.status in (3,4) and ao.buyuserid = #{userid}

select ao.ordernum, ao.orderid,ao.cardid,ao.buyuserid, ao.selluserid,ao.commentcount,ao.status,ao.ordertype,ao.profitprice,ao.cardprice, DATE_FORMAT(ao.buytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as duetime, mc.typename, timestampdiff(day,now(),ao.duetime) as remainwatchdays, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, mc.yield,mc.forder,mc.watchdays,mc.commentstartdays,mc.commentcount from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid where (ao.status in (3,4,5) and ao.selluserid = #{userid}) or (ao.status = 5 and ao.buyuserid = #{userid})

select ao.cardid,mc.typename,mc.cardimg, mc.introduction, mc.description, ao.ordernum, DATE_FORMAT(ao.rushtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buytime, DATE_FORMAT(ao.duetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as duetime, ao.commentcount as alreadycount, mc.commentstartdays, mc.commentcount, ao.cardprice, (mc.commentcount - ao.commentcount) remaincount, timestampdiff(day,now(),ao.duetime) as remaindays, mc.yield, mc.forder,mc.watchdays from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_membercard mc on ao.cardid = mc.cardid left join c_t_app_userinfo us on ao.buyuserid = us.userid left join c_t_app_paymentmethod pay on ao.selluserid = pay.userid where ao.status = 3 and ao.orderid = #{orderid}
